Summary Note:
The RM first met Isabella Alma Nørregaard at a luxury car show in Copenhagen. They both admired the latest models and discussed their interest in high-end investments, leading to a productive business relationship.
Isabella Alma Nørregaard is a 34 year old and comes from Denmark.
After extensive research, she chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
Family Background: Isabella Alma Nørregaard is currently divorced. She does not have any children.
Education Background:
Isabella graduated from Herning Gymnasium in 2009.
Isabella attended Zealand Institute of Business and Technology and graduated in 2015.
Occupation History:
Isabella Alma Nørregaard is a 34 year old and comes from Denmark.
Isabella Alma Nørregaard launched her career as a Stockbroker at PKA A/S, where she gained valuable experience from 2014 till now.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout her career, she saved 820000 DKK, investing in various assets to grow her wealth.
Her remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Esbjerg Ø, Skanderborg and Silkeborg, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
In 2020, she received an inheritance of 5000000 DKK from her late grandfather, who was a prominent Tech Entrepreneur, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Isabella as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
